xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:title: XCCDF Benchmark That References the Validation Content for the process58_test
xccdf:Benchmark.xccdf:description: This XCCDF Benchmark references the OVAL Definitions in the validation content for the process58_test.

xccdf:metadata.dc:contributor: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:publisher: National Institute of Standards and Technology
xccdf:metadata.dc:creator: National Institute of Standards and Technology

xccdf:Profile.xccdf:title: XCCDF Profile That References the Validation Content for the process58_test
xccdf:Profile.xccdf:description: This Profile allows for the tailoring of the validation content for the process58_test.

metadata.title: Test that the check_existence property is properly supported using the specified value

criterion.comment: Test to see that every process 58 item exists for the specified object.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the pid equals 0.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the pid equals 0.

metadata.description: Make sure the pid entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the pid equals 1.

metadata.title: Test the command_line entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the command_line entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the command_line equals %SYSTEMROOT%\explorer.exe.

metadata.title: Test the command_line entity with the not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the command_line entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the command_line is not equal to c:\temp\explorer.exe.

metadata.title: Test the command_line entity with the case insensitive equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the command_line entity properly supports the case insensitive equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the command_line case insensitive equals %SYSTEMROOT%\explorer.exe.

metadata.title: Test the command_line entity with the case insensitive not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the command_line entity properly supports the case insensitive not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the command_line is case insensitive not equal to c:\temp\explorer.exe.

metadata.title: Test the command_line entity with the pattern match operation
metadata.description: Make sure the command_line entity properly supports the pattern match operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the command_line matches the regular expression ^.*\\[Ee][Xx][Pp][Ll][Oo][Rr][Ee][Rr]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]

metadata.title: Test the command_line entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the command_line entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the command_line equals c:\temp\explorer.exe.

metadata.title: Test the command_line entity with the not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the command_line entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the command_line is not equal to %SYSTEMROOT%\explorer.exe.

metadata.title: Test the command_line entity with the case insensitive equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the command_line entity properly supports the case insensitive equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the command_line case insensitive equals c:\temp\explorer.exe.

metadata.title: Test the command_line entity with the case insensitive not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the command_line entity properly supports the case insensitive not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the command_line is case insensitive not equal to %SYSTEMROOT%\explorer.exe.

metadata.title: Test the command_line entity with the pattern match operation
metadata.description: Make sure the command_line entity properly supports the pattern match operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the command_line matches the regular expression .*\\eexplorer.exe.

metadata.title: Test the pid entity with the equals operation
metadata.description: Make sure the pid entity properly supports the equals operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the pid equals 4.

metadata.title: Test the pid entity with the not equal operation
metadata.description: Make sure the pid entity properly supports the not equal operation.

criterion.comment: Test to see that the pid is not equal to 3.

metadata.title: Test the pid entity with the greater than operation
